mapper.select:
SELECT T1.DICT_TYPE_ID AS dictTypeId, T1.DICT_TYPE_DETAIL AS dictTypeDetail, T1.DICT_TYPE_CODE AS dictTypeCode, T1.DICT_TYPE_NAME AS dictTypeName, T1.EXECUTIVE_STANDARD AS executiveStandard, T1.CATEGORY AS category, T1.DICT_TYPE_STATUS AS dictTypeStatus FROM syst_dict_type T1
and T1.DICT_TYPE_CODE like concat('%',#{dictTypeCode},'%')
